data.text:
@BradTatum @CDCgov wanted a better map to justify a political decision. They literally removed red from the map & changed the metrics to get their desired outcome. @CDCdirector called the public health measure of masking during a pandemic a "Scarlet Letter."
https://t.co/wQ98usPgnV
@BradTatum @AnnaMeiler Here on the Cape we don’t use data like this.  We base decisions on fear.  Right @NausetSupt ?
@BradTatum @HeyRatty Don’t you realize that nobody gives a crap about Covid anymore go the hell away
@BradTatum It’s probably bad, I see Wordle in this map.
